job_history.work_description: Basic computer network setup and troubleshooting. Install software and printers. Computer repair and upgrade for individuals. Microsoft Excel spreadsheet creation.
Assisted with administrative duties in the operations departments. Created airtime spreadsheets and assists with revenue reporting. Assisted with data entry into an internal billing system (UCAP).

Responsible for getting clients' assets re-titled into their respective trusts. Enter client data onto database and legal document generation software. Build long-term relationships with trust maintenance clients.

Prepared student reports for multiple state regulatory agencies and national accreditation agency, ACCET (Accrediting Council for Continuing Education and Training.) Answered phones. Data entry of new enrollments and materials assigned to each.

Responsible for installation and troubleshooting Windows 2000 workstations, hardware, printers, peripherals, and software. Managed telecommunications system administration, programming, and troubleshooting.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Created Microsoft Excel spreadsheets for various purposes, including airtime spreadsheets and revenue reporting, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Computer Networking
skills.explanation: Set up and troubleshot computer networks, installed software and printers, and repaired and upgraded computers, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Entered client data onto database and legal document generation software, and performed data entry of new enrollments and materials assigned to each, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Telecommunications System Administration
skills.explanation: Managed telecommunications system administration, programming, and troubleshooting, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated with clients and maintained long-term relationships, but no extensive project management experience is mentioned, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed office operations and coordinated with clients, but no extensive leadership experience is mentioned, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Database Management
skills.explanation: Entered client data onto database and legal document generation software, but no extensive database management experience is mentioned, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Software Installation
skills.explanation: Installed software and printers, but no extensive software installation experience is mentioned, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Hardware Troubleshooting
skills.explanation: Troubleshot computer hardware, but no extensive hardware troubleshooting experience is mentioned, indicating some practical experience.
